creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: R screen: large tree at R with branches and foliage extending over several panels; cluster of squared rocks at R; lotus blossoms and leaves at R; hawk perched on stone near center; another hawk at UL about to dive downward
markings: LRC of R screen: [周文六世孫] (Shūbun rokusei son); [二直庵] (Nichokuan); [包胤] (hō-in)
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair
title: Hawks by a Stream [right of a pair]
